items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.title: C4GDevs/ARCON.js: ARCON.js is a lightweight, event-based RCON client for Arma III servers designed to be reliable and easy to use.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: A lightweight, customizable menu library for creating interactive user interfaces in userscripts. It provides a clean, modern design with support for various input types and keybinds.
items.title: FrozenProductions/Frost-UI: A lightweight, customizable menu library for creating interactive user interfaces in userscripts. It provides a clean, modern design with support for various input types and keybinds.

items.content_html: flxy.js is a lightweight, flexible, and easy-to-use frontend framework built with vanilla JavaScript. Designed to help developers create dynamic and responsive web applications without the overhead of external dependencies, flxy.js provides a minimal yet powerful structure for building reusable components and managing state in an intuitive way.
items.title: deepansumor/flxyJS: flxy.js is a lightweight, flexible, and easy-to-use frontend framework built with vanilla JavaScript. Designed to help developers create dynamic and responsive web applications without the overhead of external dependencies, flxy.js provides a minimal yet powerful structure for building reusable components and managing state in an intuitive way.

items.content_html: CDN Source Fast是一个轻量级的纯前端工具，允许开发者通过一个 <script> 标签，在 HTML 中动态加载多个 CDN 资源，并支持通过 JSON 文件进行统一管理。 CDN Dynamic Loader is a lightweight, pure frontend tool that allows developers to dynamically load multiple CDN resources in HTML using a single <script> tag, with unified management supported via a JSON file.
items.title: thirstywaterx/cdnsf: CDN Source Fast是一个轻量级的纯前端工具，允许开发者通过一个 <script> 标签，在 HTML 中动态加载多个 CDN 资源，并支持通过 JSON 文件进行统一管理。 CDN Dynamic Loader is a lightweight, pure frontend tool that allows developers to dynamically load multiple CDN resources in HTML using a single <script> tag, with unified management supported via a JSON file.

items.title: outerbase/studio: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

items.content_html: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.
items.title: miksrv/simple-react-ui-kit: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.

items.content_html: An open-source, lightweight tier list creator. Craft custom rankings, use pre-made templates, and easily share your tier lists. No account needed - just create, rank, and share!
items.title: infinia-yzl/opentierboy: An open-source, lightweight tier list creator. Craft custom rankings, use pre-made templates, and easily share your tier lists. No account needed - just create, rank, and share!

items.content_html: PearDeckTerminal is a lightweight and innovative peer-to-peer terminal sharing software that allows users to collaborate seamlessly without relying on centralized servers on terminal.

items.content_html: A lightweight, self-hosted authentication and authorization solution for .NET WebAPI, providing local accounts, role management, and SSO support with minimal setup.
